A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of flash but not enough substance. Too many loose ends and pointless plot rabbit-holes. Many moments will leave you scratching your head and a handful will make this film one of the best movie theater experiences of the year. It is an emotional roller coaster of let downs and high peaks. Regardless though\, it is undoubtedly a very entertaining and exciting movie\, just don't bring too much of your brain to watch the movie.
